#Print information from the raster data
from osgeo import gdal  
gdal.UseExceptions()
access_key = TokenLibrary.getSecret('innosyn-pipeline-kv','GeospatialStorageAccountKey')
gdal.SetConfigOption('AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT', 'rawdatajbqezt')
gdal.SetConfigOption('AZURE_STORAGE_ACCESS_KEY', access_key)  
dataset_info = gdal.Info('/vsiadls/innosyn/raw/sample_4326.tif')  #/vsiadls/<container_name>/path/to/image
print(dataset_info)

#Convert GeoTiff to PNG by using GDAL
tiff_in = "/vsiadls/innosyn/raw/sample_4326.tif"
png_out = "/vsiadls/innosyn/raw/sample_image.png"
options = gdal.TranslateOptions(format='PNG')
gdal.Translate(png_out, tiff_in, options=options)

#Store geotif image in Azure Data Lake Storage
import shutil
import sys
from osgeo import gdal
from notebookutils import mssparkutils

mssparkutils.fs.unmount('/test')

gdal.UseExceptions()

mssparkutils.fs.mount( 
	"abfss://innosyn@rawdatajbqezt.dfs.core.windows.net", 
	"/test", 
	{"linkedService":"innosyn_ajvt_linked_service"} 
  )
access_key = TokenLibrary.getSecret('innosyn-pipeline-kv','GeospatialStorageAccountKey')
gdal.SetConfigOption('AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT', 'rawdatajbqezt')
gdal.SetConfigOption('AZURE_STORAGE_ACCESS_KEY', access_key)

options = gdal.WarpOptions(options=['tr'])
gdal.Warp('ajvt_image.tif', '/vsiadls/innosyn/raw/sample_4326.tif', options=options)
jobId = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()
shutil.copy("ajvt_image.tif", f"/synfs/{jobId}/test/ajvt_image.tif")

#Plot geotif image from blob storage container
import rasterio
from matplotlib import pyplot
src = rasterio.open("https://rawdatajbqezt.blob.core.windows.net/innosyn/raw/Manufacturing_ElSegundo_LSFO_SNR5H2S.tif?sp=r&st=2022-06-14T13:50:50Z&se=2022-06-17T21:50:50Z&spr=https&sv=2021-06-08&sr=b&sig=XInwNf3pYSrmhMovMbPbk8G9tVQ9KzzwO3cbBhKCwMo%3D")
pyplot.imshow(src.read(1), cmap='pink')
pyplot.show()
